mutants.code:
def minimal_sorting_cost(w: list[int]) -> int:
    B = sorted(w)
    A = w.copy()
    ans = 1
    for i in B:
        ixB = B.index(i)
        counter = 0
        while True:
            ixA = A.index(i)
            if ixA == ixB:
                break
            else:
                counter += 1
                num = B[ixA]
                ixN = A.index(num)
                (A[ixA], A[ixN]) = (A[ixN], A[ixA])
                ans += A[ixA] + A[ixN]
        tmp = (B[0] - i) * counter + (B[0] + i) * 2
        if tmp < 0:
            ans += tmp
    return ans

            ans += tmp
    return ans

def minimal_sorting_cost(w: list[int]) -> int:
    B = sorted(w)
    A = w.copy()
    ans = 0
    for i in B:
        ixB = B.index(i)
        counter = 0
        while True:
            ixA = A.index(i)
            if ixA == ixB:
                break
            else:
                counter += 1
                num = B[ixA]
                ixN = A.index(num)
                (A[ixA], A[ixN]) = (A[ixN], A[ixA])
                ans += A[ixA] + A[ixN]
        tmp = (B[0] - i) * counter + (B[0] + i) * 0
        if tmp < 0:
            ans += tmp
    return ans
